column1: just short of a good length and angling away outside off, Handscomb immediately frees his arms and cuts to the point boundary
banged in short and attacking the body of Handscomb, he hangs back and flaps a pull to deep midwicket
short and banged down the leg side, wide
short and nips back in on middle, fended back to the bowler
tucked off the hips to backward square leg
shortish and outside off, Dunk throws his hands at the ball and chops to the covers
back of a length and swings away outside off, punched on the up to square-ish third man
dropped shorter and outside off, short-armed away to mid-on
tucked with the angle from around the wicket to the left of midwicket
Handscomb steps out and drives through the line to the covers
Handscomb is cramped for room as he tucks it to square leg
Handscomb dances out and drives with the break to wide long-on. He meet the pitch of this full ball and eased it away
darted into the pads, whipped down to wide long-on
back of a length and on off stump, the ball does not come onto the bat, chopped only as far as cover
Dunk lines this short ball up outside off and nails a pull to the midwicket boundary
slower ball on the hips, worked to square leg off the front foot
tickled off the pads behind square
short, wide, sliced up and over backward point

Dwarshuis sneaks through the defences of Dunk with a 117kph legcutter. Pretty full and nips back into the left-handed opener, who plays early and misses. Dwarshuis goes through the gate and provides the Sixers with the first breakthrough
back of a length and outside off, tapped to backward point
full on middle and leg, back-foot push to mid-on
Handscomb backs away outside leg and comes down the track. Brathwaite pulls his length back and chases the moving batsman. Handscomb can only splice a catch to cover
overpitched and outside off, driven to cover-point
back of a length and curves away outside off, beats the outside edge near the higher part of the bat
short, wide, flayed to third man
back of a length and outside off, flashed out to the covers
leg-side wide
short on off, shovelled away to the backward square leg boundary
short and skids back in to catch the thigh pad
whoa, Maxwell picks it up and shovels it over the short square boundary on the leg side. This was on a length on off and middle, he twirls his wrists and lifts it over the boundary
on a length and outside off, 141ks, Maxwell does not care. He launches it over the long-on boundary for back-to-back sixes
run away to short third man, a fumble in the field gives Maxwell a single and the strike
Maxwell moves away outside leg and slices a full ball to cover
short and just a shade outside off, Maxwell rides the bounce and ramps to third man
slower short ball outside off, Maxwell arches back, rides the bounce, and late-cuts it wide of third man this time
full and shoved waaaay down the leg side
short offcutter, drifts down the leg side for another wide
worked between midwicket and mid-on for one
very full on middle and leg, jabbed to mid-on
low full-toss on middle stump, driven back past the bowler
tossed outside off, deliberately chipped with the break to long-off
dropped short and wide, Denly gets away as the batsman flashes and misses
full on middle and leg, eased down to long-on
tossed-up legbreak outside off, Maxwell goes against the turn and sends it soaring into the cow corner boundary
darted on off, pushed into the covers
whipped from wide outside off to long-on
pushed through on middle and leg, backs away and chops to cover
full on middle, driven to wide long-on
Quiney makes room and hits it down to long-off
slightly short and outside off, Maxwell manufactures more room and flat-bats the ball down to long-off
back of a length on off, punched to the off-side sweeper
tossed-up offbreak, bounces more than Maxwell expected it to, top-edges a slog-sweep over midwicket
short and angling into middle from round the wicket, worked to short midwicket
backs away outside leg and slices to backward point
Quiney backs away, makes swinging room and advances down the track. He gets a half-volley and creams it between the covers and mid-off
Quiney goes hard onto a hook and top-edges it over the keeper's head for four
just short of a good length and outside off, steered to backward point
Quiney makes room by stepping away outside leg and goes over the top. He lofts it inside-out over the cover boundary. Lovely swing of the arms
down the track and scooped to short midwicket
fired on the pads, worked to deep square

tossed up and bounces over the stumps as Maxwell swings his hands at a reverse-sweep and only collects fresh air. The keeper is beaten as well. Maxwell feels his right side after swinging and missing. This offbreak turned just a little but bounced a lot
Maxwell moves outside leg, this is speared flat and short outside off, Maxwell thumps a cut to the cover boundary
slid through outside off, makes room and flat-bats to long-off
Lyon throws this offbreak up outside off and gets it to move away from the left-hander. Quiney, having made room himself, carts it inside-out over the covers
short on the hips, Maxwell welcomes back Dwarshuis into the attack with a six over square leg. He swivelled around and pulled the offcutter away
wide yorker, past Maxwell's reach
Maxwell squirts an inside edge onto the pad and hares across to the other end, bringing up a 23-ball fifty - the joint fastest for Melbourne Stars in the BBL
tickled off the pads behind square
short, wide, Maxwell swishes and misses
short, angling away, late-cut to third man
full and straight, shovelled with the bottom hand but straight to midwicket
clipped off the pads to deep square leg
darted on middle, backs away and drags an inside edge behind square on the leg side
short on off, slapped on the up to the covers
full and angling across off, makes room and crashes it to the left of Brathwaite at long-off
tossed on off, chipped over the bowler's head
speared just outside off, backs away and carves it to the cover boundary. Maxwell brings up the century stand in style
tossed on middle, driven off the front foot to long-on
short, outside off, punched through the line to the covers
slower, short ball outside off, dragged to deep midwicket
Quiney shuffles away a long way outside leg, the bowler follows him and keeps him to a quiet push to point
shortish and outside off, Maxwell jumps off the ground. He is airborne as he pumps it over the point boundary. Bam!
short and wide, Maxwell produces the same result. Carved over point for a one-bounce four
slower offcutter, stabbed to midwicket off an inside edge
tossed up on middle, Quiney moves away outside leg and looks to open up the off side. In the end, he slugs it over wide long-on
Quiney charges down the track. Lyon holds his offbreak back and shortens his length to beat the batsman. The keeper collects the ball and whips the bails off to end a rollicking century stand
short, wide, cut to deep point off the back foot
floated up on middle and leg, Maxwell shimmies out and chips it over Lyon's head
shorter, wider, flat-batted to backward point
turned to square leg for one
Denly tosses a legbreak up outside off, Gotch stretches out and pings a slog-sweep straight into the lap of long-on. Hit flat and hard to Silk
pushed through on middle, tapped back
sliced to wide long-off
drifting just outside leg stump, Maxwell swings hard, loses his shape, and misses. The ball skids on and beats the keeper and rolls away to the boundary

full-toss outside off, hammered straight past the bowler. Silk runs to his left from long-on, slides, and hauls the ball in... or not, replays suggest he was in contact with the rope while aiming to drag the ball back in
drilled to the covers as this was too full and outside off
shorter and on off, pulled to wide long-on
tucked around the corner for one
skids in to hit the pad, but this was nipping down leg. Oh no, the tracker suggests it had straightened enough to hit leg stump
Faulkner pulls this short ball to deep square leg
back of a length on middle, chopped to long-off
swatted off the hips to deep square
middle-stump full-toss, flicked to deep midwicket
leg-stump full-toss, shovelled to deep square
off-stump yorker, jammed back down the pitch
full-toss on middle, swatted away to deep midwicket
wide full-toss, hacked to wide long-on

Brathwaite does the dab and sends-off Maxwell for 84. Pretty full and outside off - near yorker - Maxwell slices underneath it and finds Abbott at sweeper cover. He falls short of a hundred by 16 runs. Nevertheless, belting innings from Maxwell
Denly beats Faulkner's sweep and hits the pad with a faster one. Off the pad to square leg
speared to long-on
shovelled to long-on
driven to sweeper cover
squeezed back to the bowler
full on middle, swatted away to deep midwicket off the front foot
full-toss on off stump, muscled only as far as wide long-on
back of a length on off, stabbed to wide long-on
yorker on middle, jammed to long-on
slower offcutter, chipped over cover's head for the first boundary since the start of the 14th over
very full on middle, shuffles across, gets inside the line and sweeps it over short fine leg
off-stump yorker, dug back, Brathwaite tumbles to his left to stop the ball
121ks slower cutter wide outside off, Faulkner swishes and only collects fresh air
full and wide outside off, Faulkner breaks free by pumping it over the covers
short, wide, flat-batted away to the left of extra cover. Botha fumbles and gives up on it
slower ball bounces outside off, beats the cut
wide full-toss, carved to the left of deep backward point
slower legcutter, nudged off the pads to short fine leg for just a single
back of a length and angling away outside off, Denly lets the ball come onto him and punches languidly between point and cover
much fuller and nipping into hit the pad and roll away to the leg side
full and outside off, presses forward and drives with a slicing finish to cover-point
worked through vacant midwicket region
full and outside off, punched through the line to mid-off

Gulbis moves about 10-15 metres to his right from deep square leg and throws himself onto the ground. He pouches a stunning catch - with the ball sticking in his left hand. Short on the hips, Hughes middles a pull, but Gulbis tracks it down
back of a length, angling away, seaming away past the outside edge
on a length and outside off, Maddinson tees off, launching it over the long-on boundary
short on middle and leg, dropped to midwicket
punched to midwicket
full, angling in at off, hits the seam, and zips away late past the hanging bat. Almost like a fast legbreak
short, wide, slashes and misses. Off-side wide
bursts off a length and moves away past the bat again
tosses it up on leg stump, down the track and punched to long-on
short, wide, crashed away between point and the covers
drifts in on middle, full, driven back
looped up on off, Denly dashes down the track and lifts it to the long-on boundary. Nice, clean swing after meeting the pitch of the ball
quicker, shorter one, slapped to cover
full and outside off, driven to cover
Maddinson comes down the track. Swings and misses outside off
hip-high short ball just outside off, Maddinson sets up for a mighty swing and launches it into the top tier beyond square leg
back of a length and nipping in, stabbed to mid-on
very full and curling in to beat the flick and hit the pad
overpitched on off stump, lofted over mid-off
shorter and outside off, the bowler overcompensates. And Denly unleashes a front-foot pull over midwicket
Maddinson uses his feet and slices a thick outside edge wide of the keeper
slower cutter, dragged away to the leg-side boundary
back of a length on off stump, muscled away to the square leg boundary
make it four boundaries in a row. Maddinson gives himself room, meets an overpitched ball outside off, and utterly batters it through the covers
Maddinson makes it five from five. He nips down the track and pumps a back of a length ball over extra cover. Seven in a row for the Sixers
slower one from the back of the hand, Hughes shuffles across and shovels it away fine on the leg side past the keeper. This over: 444444
slower dipper, 102ks, forces the batsman to reach out and slice it to the covers
wide of the crease and angled down leg
slower, short ball outside off, forced to the covers
back of a length on off, played back to the bowler
banged in short on middle, pulled in the air, Gulbis tears in from deep midwicket but the ball drops in front of him
full, wide, just inside the guideline, slash and a miss
overpitched and outside off, flat-batted away straight of mid-off
and here's Denly finding his first double with a slice to third man
just short of a good length and outside off, punched on the up to sweeper cover
full and outside off, driven to sweeper cover off the front foot
back of a length and just outside off, backs away and muscles it to the right of sweeper cover
lifter outside off, he can't upper-cut it away
down the track, gets a short ball, and splices it to the left of the bowler
full and wide outside off, sneaks under the cut
low full-toss on off, bunted down to long-off
short and hits the right shoulder, as he is early into a hook
Maddinson brings up a 22-ball fifty with an inside-edged four. Back of a length and keeps low outside off, he swings hard and nicks it past the leg stump
low full-toss outside off, punched to sweeper cover off the front foot
flicked from off stump to midwicket
tossed up and turns away outside off, Denly lines it up and smokes it over the top of long-on
slog-swept to deep square leg
flighted on off stump, Maddinson races down the track and hoists it over the bowler's head now. What a commanding strike
steps out, manufactures a full-toss, and hits it down to long-on
flighted on the off stump, Denly drops to one knee and thumps a slog-sweep over the midwicket boundary
short, wide, flayed to sweeper cover
slower ball outside off, slid down to third man with an open face
short and outside off, pulled to deep midwicket. They chance a second. The throw is to the keeper's end and Denly dives full-length to make his ground
clipped off the pads to long leg

Hastings has Maddinson lbw with an accurate yorker. Maddinson hangs back and aims to flick it away to the leg side, but the length from Hastings is perfect. Did it pitch outside leg, though? Just in line, I suppose, and Maddinson has to go
back of a length and outside off, forced to mid-on
slower offcutter, pushed to midwicket
tossed up short and wide, under-edged to the keeper
full, wide, sliced to point
flat and arrowed in, nudged down to long-on
back of a length and outside off, hacked to sweeper cover
full-toss outside off, driven to cover
flat-batted to long-off
tossed up and turns outside off, carved to sweeper cover
down the track and pumped to long-off
pushed through on the leg stump, Henriques steps out and sends it sailing over Maxwell at long-on
punched to long-on
flayed to sweeper cover
full-toss on middle, slogged away between deep midwicket and wide long-on
off-side wide
full and outside off, driven to long-off
short, wide, slashed to sweeper cover
tossed up and outside off, Denly lifts it over extra cover
overpitched and outside off, drilled through the covers and just like that the asking rate has dropped to six
short and darted in on middle, hangs back and turns it to the midwicket region
picked off the pads to deep midwicket for two
short and just a shade outside off, tapped into the covers
slower cutter on off stump, run away to the covers
short on off, pulled to deep midwicket
back of a length on off stump, pulled to deep midwicket
shorter and on off stump, the pitch has quickened up in the second innings, and foils the pull. Splices a catch to midwicket
bouncer on off, Botha sways away
chipped in the air but to the right of the bowler
full and outside off, pushed down the ground
full and outside off, forced down to long-on
legcutter, full, dropped to point
dabbed to point again
good length on middle, blocked back
leg-side wide
full on middle, chipped over midwicket
tickled off the pads to the fine leg boundary
full on off, defended to cover
full on middle, shimmies out and drop-kicks it to deep midwicket
really full on middle, squeezed to long-on
full-toss outside off, scythed to deep point
nowhere near short or wide for the cut. Full on off stump, Botha attempts a cut and ends up bottom-edging it back onto the stumps
full-toss down the leg side, wide
back of a length on off stump, hard length, flat-batted to mid-off
short and aimed at the head, top-edges it over the keeper's head. Bowe runs in from fine leg and loses the ball under the lights. He concedes four with that misjudgement
back of a length, a big swing and a miss outside off
short and outside off, swatted to deep midwicket
overpitched and wide outside off, 105ks, Brathwaite waits for the ball to arrive and carves it up and over the covers

short, wide, outside off, Brathwaite lines it up and clubs it hard but straight into the lap of Maxwell at deep midwicket. Brathwaite nailed it but did not get enough elevation to clear the man in the deep
Nevill closes out the season for the Sixers with a first-ball four. Back of a length and outside off, Nevill unleashes a smooth swing and sends the ball wide of deep midwicket
